title: Multiplying the Numerator and Denominator
text: We can multiply the numerators to get $$80$$ and the denominators to get $$420$$. Thus, we have $$\frac{80}{420}$$.
speech: We can multiply the numerators to get , 80  and the denominators to get  420 . Thus, we have  80 over 420 .

title: Simplifying if Necessary
text: We must simply $$\frac{80}{420}$$ to put it into a fraction of lowest terms. We can divide the numerator and denominator by $$20$$ to get $$\frac{4}{21}$$
speech: We must simply , 80 over 420,  to put it into a fraction of lowest terms. We can divide the numerator and denominator by  20  to get  4 over 21
